<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 17"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Anklets of Alacrity](/Equipment.aspx?ID=397)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Apex" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=10" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 603 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Price** 15,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn anklets

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

These gem-studded golden anklets give you a +3 item bonus to Acrobatics checks. When you invest the anklets, you either increase your Dexterity score by 2 or increase it to 18, whichever would give you a higher score.

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> Interact;  **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You click the anklets together, gaining a +20-foot status bonus to all your Speeds and the effects of [_water walk_](/Spells.aspx?ID=371) for the next 10 minutes.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
